overview: Mr. Cawley was most recently CFO of Mountain Union Telecom and has over 20 years of finance, operations, and accounting experience, including serving as CFO of five venture-backed companies and raising over $500 million in capital. Previously, he was also CFO of Qovia Inc, Ipredia International, WebPerfect Solutions and GO Communications. In addition, he was Vice President of Fidelity Investments’ Venture Group where he served as President of MetroRED and was on the board of Pittencrief Communications. He was also Vice President of the Schelle Cellular Group and American Personal Communications. Mr. Cawley started his career in commercial lending to the media and telecommunications industry.
